snippet.title: Micro Vendor Adventures  - Official Trailer (iOS/Android)
snippet.description:
The game is completely free to download and play. Enjoy!
https://itunes.apple.com/app/micro-vendor-adventures/id1375303904?mt=8

Have you ever thought of what's inside a vending machine?

Watch out, Vending-Robo! The coin is coming. Let's get up and start moving your fingers.

You, as a Vending-Robo, have to deliver soda drink to your customers. You think that's easy? There are a lot of obstacles and traps you can think of, and many more you cannot think of. But don't worry, just overcome it by controlling environments like blocks and elevators. There are also hidden coins in each level. Do your best to collect all of them!

Wanna join this fun jouney? We are now recruiting you to be our next Vending-Robo.

- 8-bit retro graphics
- Challenging puzzles and boss fight
- Get 3 stars by collecing hidden coins
- Relaxing gameplay with no time limit
- No in-app purchases
